name: Dancing Daggers
description:
First ever game that I made. My name is Jurden and I'm currently studying to be a game artist.

I've always had a fascination with dancers especially in RPGs so I thought why not have a game where the main protagonist is a dancer? 

You are Aria, a young prince who runs away from your kingdom because of being an illegitimate child. Now working as a tavern dancer, you attempt to get money and shelter by performing at a place far away. But suddenly, a hefty amount of assassins come to kill you. Dodge the incoming daggers but dance as much as you can to keep the crowd happy! 

The mechanics are fairly simple as the bartender teaches you how to play the game.

contact info: mynameisjurden@gmail.com
